attributes.action: Legalise electric transport vehicles by updating “highway 1835 carriage Act”
attributes.additional_details:
Cities around the world are already reaping the benefits of innovative forms of transport such as electric scooters; with an industry valued at 1.8 Billion. 

Electric scooter hire is already implemented in cities as Madrid, Paris, Prague; and legalised in Germany. 

With such a stance on cutting down pollution; why is the UK lacking behind major countries? - pollution levels in our country is rising; leading to increased tolls, tax and drain on the NHS.

Don’t prevent the future; innovate.
attributes.background: The UK is the only large European contributor to prevent and hinder innovation of transport; with growing technological advances; electric power is becoming a solution for short trips across the city, reducing pollution and reducing the amount of cars within our streets.
